b:includable.b:tag: var exportify = { noTitle: "", viewAll: "", postAuthor: , postAuthorLabel: "", postDate: , postDateLabel: "", postLabels: }

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "gnews-pro-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "gnews-pro-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["topbar-menu","topbar-social"])

data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "header-ads")) or (data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.headerad_onpost == "1px") and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "header-ads"))
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "featured"))
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "home-ads"))

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "content-section-1"))
b:section.name: Content Section 1

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "main-ads"))
b:section.name: Main Ads 1

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:includable.b:tag: var exportify = { noTitle: "", viewAll: "", postAuthor: , postAuthorLabel: "", postDate: , postDateLabel: "", postLabels: }

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "gnews-pro-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "gnews-pro-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

div.p: UTheme - Wordpress Auto Spinner - WP Rocket Free Download - GP Premium Free Download

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "gnews-pro-related-posts"))
b:section.name: Related Posts

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "gnews-pro-post-footer-ads"))
b:section.name: Post ADS 3

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "main-ads-2"))
b:section.name: Main Ads 2

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "content-section-2"))
b:section.name: Content Section 2

b:widget.title: $title={Follow by Email} $text={Subscribe to our mailing list to get the new updates!}

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "footer-ads")) or (data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.footerad_onpost == "1px") and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "footer-ads"))
